document_data.Personality: Sarlor was oddly defiant.{{cite book/Hand of Fire/TPB 2002|119-120|7}}
document_data.Relationships: He was a guard for [[Orthil Voldovan]]'s caravan and often worked on tasks together with [[Tarth]] and [[Mulgar]].
document_data.History: Sarlor was guarding Orthil's caravan in the {{yearlinkName|1357}}, when it was joined by [[Shandril Shessair]] and [[Narm Tamaraith]]. He was assigned briefly to keep watch on Shandril; when she demanded to see Narm after he was injured during a bandit raid, he protested that they didn't follow her orders. The situation would've likely ended in a violent confrontation if it weren't for [[Arauntar]]'s timely intervention.
